reviewText: I only wanted this for little giants. The fact that it game with little big league was a plus. I will spend the weekend watching them both.

Love the movies themselves...but it says there is 4 disks included so I figured each movie was on it's own disk. That's why I bought it, I don't like double sided disks. So it was disappointing that it was only 2 disks, double sided. False advertising. If you like double sided disks, get this, if not, get the movies seperate if you can find them cheap enough.

This was a great buy for 4 movies.  My son plays just about every sport and likes to see sports movies so this was right up his alley.  I initially bought it for Little Giants, but he has also been looking at the other movies as well.

Came in a case in great shape and the DVD's were in great shape and all four shows were the kind my son loves; funny, with kids as the stars and playing the sports he likes to play. Four great shows for the price was great.

We just bought the DVD for the movie "Little Giants". What a great movie! We really enjoyed "Little Big League" too. All in all a good purchase and I would recomend it to any family with active sports fan children.

This four movie sports pack will blow your mind. Family favorites and great memories. This 4 film favorite will fill your whole day with memories. Good enough to watch over and over and share with a new generation.
I got this movie for my kids and they loved it. My son started football this year an it was perfect. Arrived on time. Good find, thanks!
Good films.
when i bought this it was four DVD with some special features and commentary tracks well worth the money
The movies themselves are fine.  I just didn't realize that they were all on 1 DVD.  I had purchased it as a gift thinking I was giving 4 separate DVD's  It is great for your mini van!
Arrived fast with no problems works great love these movies from my childhood its a must buy Thank You 4 film favs
good movies to have
As described!
The grandsons loved it...3 of their favorite movies plus a new movie...it doesn't get much better!
Super Value and these are all great Family Friendly movies.
Great movies that son loves!
Amazing films
Love it
It comes with 4 movies, and at a great price too. Perfect for the kids as a gift
Bought for Little Giants.  Great sports kid movie.
Loved these as a kid and now both son's are enjoying them!
Fast delivery ! Great quality classics
Great price for 4 movies. We've only seen little giants so far but great deal!
it is a great package.
great movie. bought for  my little league team to get them though the season. The Picture quality is great and came really fast with no scratches.
I like that these movies came as a package on one disc and at a decent price!

I searched over, over, and over all through the Internet and couldn't find Little Giants at a good price except for this 4 film favorite. My 6 year old nephew loves these movies. He watches them repeatedly. All four movies are full of good, quality, family fun. You won't be disappointed!
Just what you expect the to be. Cheesy old movies. They are standard definition. No extras. Just four discs containing old movies.
Great movies!
only wanted one of the 4 movies but with this bundle i saved money! awesome price!
Really just wanted it for Little Giants as that movie is hard to find and costs big bucks alone.
Four family movies for everyone.
Big hit with grandsons
i bought this just for little giants but all movies are good
they don't make great kid movies any more these days

I honestly just bought this 4 pack of movies for the little giants. I have been looking for the little giants on DVD for awhile now, and this was all I could find at the time. I doubt I will watch the other movies, but for the price that is fine with me. The DVD worked well, and it didn't give me any issues. Now if only I could find this movie on blu-ray.
the package came in fine it was not damaged at all and it even came in before expected...otherwise movies are all really funny and I'm glad I made this purchase
Classic kid movies

I like kids sports movies as I once sponsored a little league soccer team in Mexico.
Good family entertainment at a good price.
Bought as a gift

Little Big League and Little Giants are two favorites of mine from when I was young so I jumped on the chance to order them together. They are great family movies. This set comes with four separate DVDs which is better than them all being on one disc as well.
It's a gift but I've seen the movies and this is a bargain!
I was beyond excited to see these 4 movies in a bundle.  I was looking for just Little Giants, but it cost more than getting all 4 of these great movies!  Totally worth it!
Loved these movies. They were what I was expecting. No skipping or scratches. Great for family movie night!
Love it as akid n still now as a parent
Need i say more?!
Good product
Awesome! thanks you.
I bought this for Little Giants, as it is very expensive to buy by itself.  The other three movies were just a bonus, but it's a nice little collection of movies.

Great price.  Have been looking for Little Giants - by itself is very expensive.  Was concerned that t would be a substandard CD, but it wasn't.  We watched The Little Giants and it was just as we remembered.  Haven't watched the other movies yet, but if you want the classic "The Little Giants" (Yes, I just called it a classic), this is a great price.
All 4 really great movies, love watching these family movies with my daughter.
Love Ed O'Neil and the other stars in the other three movies on this movie grouping.
Little giants is my favorite

Awesome deal for a 4-pack of movies. Originally was searching for just The Littlr Giants but this was a third of the price and you get 3 other movies. My kids love them! I love that they are 4 seperate DVD's.
These four films are great for the price. We are big fans of baseball movies and this didn't dissapoint. They are all great family movies. I'd definitely recommend this set!
None of these movies are amazing but they're all fun, they look and sound fine, nothing really great here but nothing terrible either.
made my Sunday afternoon very enjoyable.
Perfect set for my athletic grandies!
Bought these for my son and he loves them.
Hours of fun and entertainment for any sport loving kid!
Bought the 4 Pack Speacial for the Movie Little Giants, it is so hard to find out there cause of the Disney Vault thing they do!
Great movies from the 90's. They all are very clear and sound great. Strongly recommended . My kids love them as do I.
Great selection of DVD's! Was the perfect gift!

Truth be told I got this just for little giants but I have found that the other movies were quite entertaining as well
Love the little giants!

A better collection for tykes. Not much to say other than my customary urging for femmes of all stripes to step up their game. This is a good collection of family films aimed at young sport enthusiasts. Watch it with a really large non-caloric beverage!
Only bought this for The Little Giants and got three other movies for less than I would have paid for the one! I'm happy with my purchase! :)
Excellent for my 7 year old boy...he enjoyed them.

Awesome four pack
great kids movies

good deal on some good movies. One seems out of place but the kids just skipped that one.

I just bought it for Little Giants.  It's half the price as buying Little Giants by itself.  We had never heard of the other three.  My kids really liked Surf Ninjas.  It was goofy but entertaining with Rob Schneider as a silly redheaded teenager and Leslie Nielson as the villain.  Each movie comes on its own dvd, 4 discs in one case.  Little Big League was okay, but gets a little boring.  We haven't watched Hometown Legend yet.
Good
Great movies for kids into sports
been looking for little giants for awhile love the movie watched it with my kids laughed a lot. even better getting 4 movies for the price.
I got this only for Little Giants bc the single DVD was something like $80 if I remember. Literally will never watch the other 3 but Little Giants is just as entertaining as it was when I was a kid.
Kids love it!
I only wanted little giants but I can only find this one. I haven't seen the rest but little giants is great and in a football house like ours it even that much better. I love this movie
I love all these kinds of DVDs. Being a grandmother I always want to have something on hand when the grandkids come over. The value is great. One small price for 4 movies....can't beat that!
Bought this because Little Giants was a favourite as a child!
My order came in early very happy.
I was originally looking for Little Giants but when I saw this, and for a way better deal, I bought it immediately! It was a great gift!

I loved it

Loved Little Big League and LIttle Giants, that is why I purchased this set.  The kids wanted to watch Hometown Legend first, was really cute. we enjoyed it.  We've watched 3 of the 4.  Still have Surf Ninjas :)
Little Giants is one of my favorite childhood movies!
Excellent!!!

It's a pretty good collection. I got it for Little Giants (the individual DVD cost more than this bundle) and the other movies weren't terrible. A little goofy but they didn't put a dent in my wallet.
Little giants the best one
I watched these movies back when they came out. I'm glad I'm able to share them with my kids.
3 okay movies one really good one. Little Giants rules. The others are just okay. This is your cheapest option for getting Little Giants on Blu Ray.

Well of course I love it. It four cute movies that I watched when I was younger.

However, there are 4 disc in the case. I thought it would only be one disc. Now I need to buy individual cases so my kids do not scratch the movies.
Good movie
Only bought this for Little Giants. Amazing movie! Haven't watched the others yet and not sure if I ever will. These are four individual DVD's held in one case. They are not double sided.
I just wanted little giants one of the best classic football kids movie ever...but to get three more movies...great value for the money
Great quality for a great price! My family and I are very satisfied with this product and couldn't be happier with the film selection.

Was happy to finally find a copy of the Little Giants movie that was resonably priced. I put the other ones on for my nephews as they have come to really enjoy the others, but Little Giants is for sure the prize in this bundle.
My boys love these movies and have for years! This is the first time i had been able to find Little Giants on dvd so we are really happy!
I love these movies and havebeen looking for them for a long time. Never seen or heard of Hometown Legend so we'll see what happens with that.
My children love sports and they absolutely love these movies!! they want to watch them every day!!! especially Little Giants!
My boys and I love watching these movies but the main reason we bought the set was for The Little Giants. Such a good collection and an even better price!
My friend ordered this.  He love sport movies.  These are a must for your collection.  I am so glad that we were able to find them here at a great price.

I bought this for the Little Giants DVD. I really loved this movie as a child but I never owned it myself and have actually been looking into buying it for some years now but it's really expensive on it's own.

I am VERY happy I bought it! And would definitely suggest buying it!
Sports movies are always good to show in the classroom during the different sports seasons.  I absolutely love the little giants and it is so nice when you can get 4 movies for that price.

I bought this mainly for The Little Giants, but am stoked about other sports movies on it. My husband received it for Christmas and it was exactly what we were looking for. The movie is clear and the DVDs came in mint condition

I had the movie Little Giants in my daycare and wanted my granddaughter to see it. I looked in all the video stores and pawn shops and couldn't find it. I was so excited to see it for sale on Amazon. We also enjoyed one of the other ones that came with it. Thank you
My kids love sports so this was great! Plus this is the cheapest way to her Little Giants on DVD!!

3 of the movies went in the trash or were given away, but I kept "Little Giants" for myself. It was really hard to find that movie at a reasonable price by itself, so I couldn't say no to this great price

I bought this movie for little giants specifically, its so much cheaper than getting the single DVD itself. And with it I got Little Big league, another one of my childhood favorites. I adamantly haven't watched the other two, but just for the first two movies alone this gets my 5 star approval. Great fun for the whole family.
My grandson is into sports. When he can't play them, he likes to watch them. This DVD fit the situation. It provides hours of entertainment.

I mainly wanted Little Giants, which was nearly impossible to find "a la carte," but this collection does the trick! There are actually 4 DVDs inside, not one with 4 movies crammed on it! If you already have the box but have lost the disc to any of these, than this collection is a must have!

this is one of my christmas list items and it was a very good item at a good price, thank you. this is the tv show from when i was a kid and they are not so bad as are the ones on today tv. i would rather pay to buy good things for kids to watch than to allow them to see the evil and bad tv shows of today.

The only reason why I bought this was because of "The Little Giants" movie. The other three I have never watched and probably will never watch. What I was really happy about was that each movie was an individual dvd. They were all stacked on top of each other in the box. I was really afraid that they would be printed, "Side A, Side B." Luckily, they weren't. "The Little Giants" is just as amazing as I remember years ago. Seriously get this.

I actually bought this for "Little Giants" but all of the movies were really enjoyable.  I bought it to watch with my nephews when they sleep over - but we ended up watching all of them eventually because they were all so fun to watch.  They are very family-friendly movies to watch.
Great movie pack for the money! Case was cracked during shipping. Would try to use more secure shipping method!! Other than that, everything was great
I have searched high and low for the Little Giants movie and I was beyond excited to find it on here. I also got to get an additional three movies in the whole deal.
A great collection of sports-based kids movies.  Lots of little boy humor.  Little Giants is a movie that boys laugh out loud over.

I bought this just for little giants. It brings me back to being a little kid... I miss it but it lets me get away for awhile. I love all the movies in this pack! Well worth the money! Also it isn't crappy double sided discs, each movie is on it's individual disc which I love!

There is so much entertainment in this group.  Several have been our favorites from the first time we saw them!  Little Big League is one of those.  But all four on this DVD are good for the entire family who love sports as we do.  This is a good collection, especially with the price being so affordable.  It is wonderful for a family on a tight budget as so many are, to have this option of getting four at the price normally paid for one. That along with the quality, makes this purchase a home run!

My 3 yr old loves the Little Giants most of all but really enjoys them all..........he's a sports fanatic so it's very exciting for him. I'm so glad we found this great package deal of 4 movies for a great price!!
Bought these classic for my grandson. His father enjoyed them as a child. The old movies still remain our family favorites . Glad I could find them on Amazon!

With the price that we paid for the for movies it was a good deal. Our kids will enjoy them for awhile. Only downfall was every movie had its own CD no combinations and were stacked directly on one another, leaves chances of scratching in one case.
I love this movie it's funny great to watch with my son and my son enjoys watching this movie alot
I bought this solely because of Little Giants. It's so 90s, and I LOVE it. Me and my cousins would watch it all the time growing up.
Cant find a reasonable price for the DVD Little Giants any where but here.  Also has another good movie in "LIttle Big League.
I got this just for little giants.  Not a bad price for some other decent shows too.  The others shows will be fun to watch too.

I have to be honest - I never watched any of the other 3 movies - I only purchased this for the copy of Little Giants. I was reminded of how awesome the movie is and have watched it a couple of times since purchasing. It was a great buy for one movie let alone four. Maybe I'll get around to watching the others eventually.
I loved watching these movies as a child, so it's perfect that they are all together!  It saves me so much money to not buy them separately.
Very good movies my kids enjoy and loved it, i would recomend it  for people to get it too for there kids.

While I have never seen Hometown Hero, I couldn't pass up acquiring three of my favorite childhood movies in one shot.  I especially like the fact that I found Surf Ninja's because that movies was extremely hard to find.

This movie is great! I bought this set specifically for Little Giants. This movie is hard to come across at the local retail stores such as Target, Walmart, & Best Buy. You will never find it there. I received the product super quick and it was exactly what I was looking for. My kids, both ages 11 & 4 (son & daughter) enjoyed the movie! I highly recommend buying this product from this seller!

I have looked everywhere for The Little Giants DVD and it must be rare as there are only a couple on eBay for about $100!!
So I was very happy to find this DVD for such a good price.
Great favorites in one bundle. Wanted to have a variety to show our son, and he enjoyed watching these movies.
My kids love all the movies, they are 6, 5, and 3 and they all enjoyed the movies that my husband and I enjoyed when we were little
I bought it only for Little Giants, but all four movies were awesome. Just as I remember when I was a kid!
Could not find Little Giants on DVD until this 4 pack.  My kids loved all 4 movies and great for a road trip.

This was a great movie package my kids loved it and it brought me back to my childhood.
plus you get 4 movies for the price of one
Bought this for my boys (5 and 3) and the love all 4 movies. This bundle is a great value!
The item came in excellent conditions, well packed, very nice NEW, no defect, as i expected. . . . .
I mainly purchased it for the little giants movie but the other movies are great too! the movies are on each side of the dvd so it can be confusing.
My daughter's favorite movie is 'Little Giants' and I have been trying to find the movie alone for over a year. This was a very cost-effective way to replace the movie.
Cannot go wrong with these kids movies like this, they were great options growing up for wholesome childrens entertainment and now Im raising my kids on these.
We bought this just for Little Giants and the only one we have watched is Little Giants. Such a classic movie. The baseball version of The Mighty Ducks.
My sons are 8 and 5 and they love these. Surf Ninja is their least favorite but for the price you can't go wrong!
I bought this DVD for my daughter's birthday because she loves the movie Little Giants. She opened it up and only one dvd of two was included, the ine without Little Giants. What a ripoff!
did you know to buy little giants it is like 65+ dollars? it is in this 4 pack! yes yes yes yes yes yes yes

It is very entertaining and clean.  It is a great movie to add to our collection of kid and sport movies.
It is 2 cds, one movie is on front and the other on back.  No big deal.  COuld not find Little Giants anywhere else.  The other movies are ok.
Came quick even before it was supposed to! Love it! Great Christmas item.  Wll be ordering from here again. Thanks!
My grandson got this for Christmas and he seems to like all the movies on it. Ther are 4 great movies all together.
although they have perfect copies of the movies, all the movies are on one disc and contain no feature other than selecting the "play" feature from a rather low budget "Menu" screen haha
Was looking for the Little Giants movie for my child for Christmas and got a bonus of 3 extra movies!  All the kids love it!!!

I could not find Little Giants on DVD and the same went for Surf Ninjas. Little Big League was a plus and I still haven't and probably never will watch the other one.

Quality is fine, price is great. I'm just glad I didn't have to track down a VHS copy of Little Giants to give as a gift (it's why I originally bought the collection).
